sakai:query-template: //*[@sling:resourceType='sakai/group-home' and (jcr:contains(public/*/*/*/*/*,'{q}') or jcr:contains(public/*/*/*/*,'{q}') or jcr:contains(public/*/*/*,'{q}') or jcr:contains(public/*/*,'{q}') or jcr:contains(public/*,'{q}') or jcr:contains(pages/*/*/*/*/*,'{q}') or jcr:contains(pages/*/*/*/*,'{q}') or jcr:contains(pages/*/*/*,'{q}') or jcr:contains(pages/*/*,'{q}') or jcr:contains(pages/*,'{q}'))] order by @{sortOn|jcr:score} {sortOrder|descending}
sakai:title: Groups
sakai:shortDescription: Get the group profile nodes out of the repository.
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "q", "description" : "The term you want to match against. This will match any property on the group profile."}
{"name" : "sortOn", "description" : "The name of the property you wish to sort on. This only has any affect if it is used with the sortOrder parameter. The default is jcr:score"}
{"name" : "sortOrder", "description" : "The order you wish to sort in. Either 'ascending' or 'descending'."}
sakai:description: Get group profile nodes out of the repository filtered by any value on the profile node..
